Name: Project Centauri
About the game: Project Centauri As you travel to find a new home for a near extinct species you reach Alpha Centauri. A safe haven from the zemulons a fierce warrior species but as you arrive to take this home as your own you the native population protect themselves from an invasion of there home world. Game play This game features a survival like aspect of protecting yourself from the zemulons. As you progress the rounds get harder but give the potential to upgrade your ship, what you choose decides you fate. Features Fight in a survival game mode of killed to not be killed Control base ship which features Missiles Turret Shield Impressive AI of two ships! Capital Runner Missiles! Turrets! Shields!
